H3.text: who plays colin on young and the restless. Tristan Rogers

A4.text: Tristan Rogers portrayed Colin Atkinson on The Young and the Restless from 2010 to 2014, with multiple returns and departures.

A5.text: In 2015, Tristan Rogers was still portraying Colin Atkinson on The Young and the Restless alongside his role as Robert Scorpio.
